snippet: The Nigerian-born, British-educated lawyer-turned-fashion-designer merges riotous prints with daring shapes for collections that transcend trends — and global boundaries.
abstract: Duro Olowu, Nigerian-born, British-educated lawyer-turned-fashion-designer, transcends fashion trends and global boundaries with style that merge energetic prints with daring shapes.
lead_paragraph: The Nigerian-born, British-educated lawyer-turned-fashion-designer merges riotous prints with daring shapes for collections that transcend trends — and global boundaries.

headline.main: Duro Olowu, Inspired by the World
